DOC.brief_summary: Subjects anterior acute STEMI receive IABC primary PCI decrease MI size .
DOC.brief_title: Counterpulsation Reduces Infarct Size Pre-PCI AMI
DOC.detailed_description: Post clearance device study subject acute MI randomize 1:1 either receive IAB receive standard care without IAB mechanical reperfusion . Subjects follow throughout hospital stay 30 day .
DOC.criteria: Able understand sign ICF ≥ 18 ≤ 90 year age General good health , opinion investigator ST elevation 2mm 2 contiguous anterior lead ≥ 4mm total anterior lead Scheduled PCI < 6 hour onset symptom MI Known contraindication MRI Prior thrombolytic therapy index event Known history MI Known severe aortic insufficiency Known aortic aneurysm Known severe calcific aortailiac disease peripheral vascular disease Experiencing cardiac shock Known endstage renal disease Weight > 400 lb . height < 4 ft .
